text: The NASCAR Gander Outdoors Truck Series will be the 25th season of third- highest stock-car racing in the United States, the season will begin with the NextEra Energy Resources 250 at Daytona International Speedway and end with the Ford EcoBoost 200 at Homestead-Miami Speedway, Gander Outdoors began as the title sponsor as Camping World decided not to remain as title sponsor. == Teams and drivers == === Complete schedule === Manufacturer Team Driver Crew Chief Ford ThorSport Racing 88 Matt Crafton TBA Ford ThorSport Racing 98 Grant Enfinger TBA === Limited schedule === === Changes === == Schedule == The schedule, comprising of 23 races, was released on June 15, 2018. No. Race title Track Date 1 NextEra Energy Resources 250 Daytona International Speedway, Daytona Beach February 15 2 Active Pest Control 200 Atlanta Motor Speedway, Hampton February 23 3 Stratosphere 200 Las Vegas Motor Speedway, Las Vegas March 1 4 Alpha Energy Solutions 250 Martinsville Speedway, Ridgeway March 23 5 JAG Metals 350 Texas Motor Speedway, Fort Worth March 29 6 JEGS 200 Dover International Speedway, Dover May 3 7 37 Kind Days 250 Kansas Speedway, Kansas City May 10 8 North Carolina Education Lottery 200 Charlotte Motor Speedway, Concord May 17 9 PPG 400 Texas Motor Speedway, Fort Worth June 7 10 M&MS; 200 Iowa Speedway, Newton June 15 11 Eaton 200 Gateway Motorsports Park, Madison June 22 12 Overton's 225 Chicagoland Speedway, Joliet June 28 13 Buckle Up In Your Truck 225 Kentucky Speedway, Sparta July 11 14 Gander Outdoors 150 Pocono Raceway, Long Pond July 27 15 Eldora Dirt Derby Eldora Speedway, Rossburg August 1 16 Corrigan Oil 200 Michigan International Speedway, Brooklyn August 10 NASCAR Gander Outdoors Truck Series playoffs Round of 8 17 UNOH 200 Bristol Motor Speedway, Bristol August 15 18 Chevrolet Silverado 250 Canadian Tire Motorsports Park, Bowmanville August 25 19 World of Westgate 200 Las Vegas Motor Speedway, Las Vegas September 13 Round of 6 20 fred's 250 Talladega Superspeedway, Lincoln, Alabama October 12 21 Texas Roadhouse 200 Martinsville Speedway, Ridgeway October 26 22 Lucas Oil 150 ISM Raceway, Avondale November 8 Championship 4 23 Ford EcoBoost 200 Homestead- Miami Speedway, Homestead November 15 == References == Category:NASCAR races Category:2019 in sports Category:2010s in the United States
title: 2019 NASCAR Gander Outdoors Truck Series
